Package jcurses.util

Class Rectangle

  • java.lang.Object
    • jcurses.util.Rectangle

  • public class Rectangle
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a class to represent an screen rectangle. To implement this class was needed, because java.awt.rectangle works with double's, this is by a text based terminal senseless.

      • contains

        public boolean contains​(int X,
                        int Y,
                        int W,
                        int H)
        The method veriifies, whether a rectangle lies within this rectangle
        Parameters:
        X - x coordinate of the rectangle, whose containment is to verify
        Y - y coordinate of the rectangle, whose containment is to verify
        W - width of the rectangle, whose containment is to verify
        H - x height of the rectangle, whose containment is to verify
        Returns:
        true if the parameter rectangle is withhin this rectangle in other case false

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • intersection

        public Rectangle intersection​(Rectangle r)
        The method returns an intersection of the rectangle with an other rectangle, that is, the greatest rectangle, that is contained in both.
        Parameters:
        r - rectangle to build intersection with this rectangle
        Returns:
        the intersection rectangle

      • union

        public Rectangle union​(Rectangle r)
        The method returns an union of the rectangle with an other rectangle, that is, the smallest rectangle, that contains both.
        Parameters:
        r - rectangle to build union with this rectangle
        Returns:
        the union rectangle

      • inside

        public boolean inside​(int x,
                      int y)
        The method veriifies, whether a point lies within this rectangle
        Parameters:
        X - x coordinate of the point, whose containment is to verify
        Y - y coordinate of the point, whose containment is to verify
        Returns:
        true if the point is withhin this rectangle in other case false
